00013 //
00014 // Use defines to allocate slots in the mutex manager. Put these defines in LOCAL.H
00015 //

00017 HANDLE MutexTable[MAX_MUTEX_HANDLES];
00018 
00019 BOOLEAN InitializeMutexManager(void)
00020 {
00021   UINT32 uiIndex;
00022 
00023   //
00024   // Register the Mutex Manager debug topic
00025   //
00026 
00027   RegisterDebugTopic(TOPIC_MUTEX, "Mutex Manager");
00028   DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Initializing the Mutex Manager");  
00029 
00030   //
00031   // Initialize the table of mutex handles to NULL
00032   //
00033 
00034   for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < MAX_MUTEX_HANDLES; uiIndex++)
00035   {
00036     MutexTable[uiIndex] = NULL;
00037   }
00038 
00039   return TRUE;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void ShutdownMutexManager(void)
00043 {
00044   UINT32 uiIndex;
00045 
00046   DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Shutting down the Mutex Manager");
00047 
00048   //
00049   // Make sure all mutex handles are closed
00050   //
00051 
00052   for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < MAX_MUTEX_HANDLES; uiIndex++)
00053   {
00054     if (MutexTable[uiIndex] != NULL)
00055     {
00056       CloseHandle(MutexTable[uiIndex]);      
00057       MutexTable[uiIndex] = NULL;
00058     }
00059   }
00060 
00061   UnRegisterDebugTopic(TOPIC_MUTEX, "Mutex Manager");
00062 }
00063 
00064 BOOLEAN InitializeMutex(UINT32 uiMutexIndex, UINT8 *ubMutexName)
00065 {
00066   MutexTable[uiMutexIndex] = CreateMutex(NULL, FALSE, ubMutexName);
00067   if (MutexTable[uiMutexIndex] == NULL)
00068   {
00069     //
00070     // Mutex creation has failed.
00071     //
00072     DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Mutex initialization has failed.");
00073     return FALSE;
00074   }
00075 
00076   return TRUE;
00077 }
00078 
00079 BOOLEAN DeleteMutex(UINT32 uiMutexIndex)
00080 {
00081   if (MutexTable[uiMutexIndex] == NULL)
00082   {
00083     //
00084     // Hum ?? We just tried to initialize a mutex entry which doesn't have a reserved slot
00085     //
00086   
00087     DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Mutex cannot be deleted since it does not exit");  
00088     return FALSE;
00089   }
00090   
00091   if (CloseHandle(MutexTable[uiMutexIndex]) == FALSE)
00092   {
00093     //
00094     // Hum, the mutex deletion has failed
00095     //
00096     
00097     DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Mutex cannot be deleted since it does not exit");  
00098     return FALSE;
00099   }
00100 
00101   MutexTable[uiMutexIndex] = NULL;
00102     
00103   return TRUE;
00104 }
00105 
00106 BOOLEAN EnterMutex(UINT32 uiMutexIndex, INT32 nLine, char *szFilename)
00107 {
00108   switch (WaitForSingleObject(MutexTable[uiMutexIndex], INFINITE))
00109   {
00110     case WAIT_OBJECT_0
00111     : return TRUE;
00112     case WAIT_TIMEOUT
00113     : DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Possible infinite loop detected due to enter mutex timeout");  
00114       return FALSE;
00115     case WAIT_ABANDONED
00116     : DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Abandoned mutex has been found");
00117       return FALSE;
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 BOOLEAN EnterMutexWithTimeout(UINT32 uiMutexIndex, UINT32 uiTimeout, INT32 nLine, char *szFilename)
00122 {
00123   switch (WaitForSingleObject(MutexTable[uiMutexIndex], uiTimeout))
00124   {
00125     case WAIT_OBJECT_0
00126     : return TRUE;
00127     case WAIT_TIMEOUT
00128     : return FALSE;
00129     case WAIT_ABANDONED
00130     : return FALSE;
00131   }
00132   return TRUE;
00133 }
00134 
00135 BOOLEAN LeaveMutex(UINT32 uiMutexIndex, INT32 nLine, char *szFilename)
00136 {
00137   if (ReleaseMutex(MutexTable[uiMutexIndex]) == FALSE)
00138   {
00139     DbgMessage(TOPIC_MUTEX, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR : Failed to leave mutex");  
00140     return FALSE;
00141   }
00142     
00143   return TRUE;
00144 }

00152 CRITICAL_SECTION MutexTable[MAX_MUTEX_HANDLES];

00154 BOOLEAN InitializeMutexManager(void)
00155 {
00156   UINT32 uiIndex;
00157 
00158   //
00159   // Make sure all mutex handles are opened
00160   //
00161 
00162   for (uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < MAX_MUTEX_HANDLES; uiIndex++)
00163   {
00164     InitializeCriticalSection(&MutexTable[uiIndex]);
00165   }
00166   
00167   RegisterDebugTopic(TOPIC_MUTEX, "Mutex Manager");  
00168 
00169   return TRUE;
00170 }
